      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(IConnectionPointConfiguration connectionPointConfiguration,
                                       IConnectionPoint connectionPoint,
                                       boolean logEachConnectionAttempt)
                                throws ConnectionException
        Attempt to start a Connection at the given connection point.

        Implementation Note:
        A given connection point may have several possible connections - for backup or load balancing purposes. This method should try to start each connection in turn until it finds one that connects successfully. It should only throw an exception if none of the connections were successful.

        Parameters:
        connectionPointConfiguration - TBD
        connectionPoint - TBD
        logEachConnectionAttempt - TBD
        Returns:
        Started Connection or null if there is no Connection known for this connection point.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - (wrapped around an IOException) if there are connections but none could be started or if there is a problem communicating with the factory.

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(IConnectionPointConfiguration connectionPointConfiguration,
                                       IConnectionPoint connectionPoint,
                                       boolean logEachConnectionAttempt,
                                       boolean nonBlockingConnection)
                                throws ConnectionException
        Attempt to start a Connection at the given connection point.

        Implementation Note:
        A given connection point may have several possible connections - for backup or load balancing purposes. This method should try to start each connection in turn until it finds one that connects successfully. It should only throw an exception if none of the connections were successful.

        Parameters:
        connectionPointConfiguration - TBD
        connectionPoint - TBD
        logEachConnectionAttempt - TBD
        nonBlockingConnection - TBD
        Returns:
        Started Connection or null if there is no Connection known for this connection point.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - (wrapped around an IOException) if there are connections but none could be started or if there is a problem communicating with the factory.

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(IConnectionPointConfiguration connectionPointConfiguration,
                                       IConnectionPoint connectionPoint,
                                       boolean logEachConnectionAttempt,
                                       boolean nonBlockingConnection,
                                       int connectionIndex)
                                throws ConnectionException
        Attempt to start a Connection at the given connection point.

        This method is similar to getConnection(IConnectionPointConfiguration, IConnectionPoint, boolean) except that only the connection specified by the index is tried.

        Parameters:
        connectionPointConfiguration - TBD
        connectionPoint - TBD
        logEachConnectionAttempt - TBD
        nonBlockingConnection - TBD
        connectionIndex - The index of the connection to try, starting from zero and ending with the total number of connections minus one. A negative value is taken to mean that all connections should be tried.
        Returns:
        Started Connection or null if there is no Connection known for this connection point.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - (wrapped around an IOException) if there are connections but none could be started or if there is a problem communicating with the factory.
